attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP

attributes.review: When I got this app I noticed all these bugs started crawling around. I start puking and got a fever. Then my legs broke and I had to live in a wheel chair and there was nothing no one could do. My boyfriend left me for my sister and my parents cut me off so now I’m living in a cardboard box downtown where people throw trash at me. I was kicked out of school because I lost all my money and everything was stolen. The only company I have are the bugs and sometimes they crawl inside me 😭 I used to have the phatest 🐱 but now it’s shriveled up and smells like fish and it hurts when I pee 😡 this orange man app has ruined my life and I don’t know what to do... I miss my family and my boyfriend and my friends. I should have NEVER got this app definitely do not recommend. -10000/10 😤

attributes.review: This app took forever to download and then when I finally got on the app after a week of downloading it there was this noise  it kept playing almost like a high pitch frequency and then some times when I went to go on the app my phone would shut off for a whole week and then come back on and the app wouldn’t be there.so with that being said I deleted the app and you should to cause its trash just like man it’s for...
attributes.title: Worst app I have ever download

attributes.review: Little did I know when downloading this app that it stores all you data, and by all I mean all. It somehow learned the location of my bathroom in my house and every time I entered the bathroom it sent me a notification calling me a little pee pee girl and if it noticed that I took longer in the bathroom it called me a poo poo girl. I cried myself to sleep every night until I gathered the courage to delete the app.
